subject: Negotiation
title: Managing Implementation
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Managing Implementation.

hook.text: Half of negotiated agreements fail not at the table but during implementation.

buildup.text: A perfect deal on paper means nothing if nobody follows through on commitments.

discovery.text: Smart negotiators build milestones, check-ins, and consequences into the agreement.

twist.text: Vague language like 'as soon as possible' is the top source of post-deal disputes.

climax.text: Specify who does what, by when, and what happens if they don't â€” before you sign.

punchline.text: A deal is only as good as its follow-through.

quiz.question: What is the #1 source of post-deal disputes?
options: Vague language like 'as soon as possible'
